```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Get census data
install.packages("tidycensus")
library(tidycensus)

census_api_key("fa1f22a59be49b0aa3a0a638fc8ec6ab84af62be", install = TRUE, overwrite = TRUE)

# Pull economic data
income_data <- get_acs(
  geography = "state",
  variables = "B19013_001",
  year = 2020,
  survey = "acs5"
)

# Pull education data
education <- get_acs(
  geography = "state",
  variables = c(
    "B15003_017", # diploma
    "B15003_022", # Bachelor's
    "B15003_023"  # Master's
  ),
  year = 2020,
  survey = "acs5"
)

# Download BEA data
install.packages("BEA.r")
library(bea.r)

# Unlock BEA key
bea_Key <- "9EFC7A8B-2A67-486D-9F8B-6AA3A26DBCF8"
```
